mapper.insert: insert into board (pk, title, description, create_date, category, member_pk) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{description}, sysdate, #{category}, #{member_pk})
insert into reply (board_pk, member_pk, content) values(#{board_pk}, #{member_pk}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where pk=#{board_pk}
mapper.insert: insert into goodbad (board_pk, member_pk, category) values (#{board_pk}, #{member_pk}, #{category})
mapper.update: update goodbad set bad='true' where member_pk=#{member_pk} and category=#{category}
update goodbad set good='true' where member_pk=#{member_pk} and category=#{category}
mapper.select: select ${status} from goodbad where member_pk=#{member_pk} and category=#{category}
select member_pk from goodbad where member_pk=#{member_pk} and category=#{category}

select * from (select rownum rnum,pk,title,description,image,good,bad,hit,create_date,member_pk from (select * from board where category=#{category} order by create_date desc)) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1)*20+1) and rnum <= (#{page}*20)
select distinct name from tags where category=#{category}
select pk,title,create_date from (select rownum,pk,title, create_date from board where category=#{category} order by create_date desc) where rownum <= 10
select nickname,image,content,good,bad,r.create_date from reply r,member m where r.board_pk=#{pk} and r.member_pk=m.pk
